title: Sam's Club is raising its membership by $5
description: Add a Sam's Club membership to the list of subscriptions that are getting more expensive.

title: Toyota investing $5.6 billion to build EV batteries, despite its own doubts
description: Toyota announced plans Wednesday to invest $5.6 billion in new plants to build electric vehicle batteries in Japan and the United States. But unlike other automakers who are going all-in on EVs, Toyota said it's still not convinced that's the best path forward.

title: Bed Bath & Beyond is making a last-ditch effort to save itself
description: Bed Bath & Beyond's stock tumbled in early trading after it announced layoffs, store closures and fresh financing plans as it tries to reverse its business' decline.

title: Consumers are splurging on expensive bourbon
description: The bourbon boom is showing no signs of ending anytime soon: Wall Street is still wild about whiskey. Jack Daniel's owner Brown-Forman reported quarterly results Wednesday morning that easily topped analysts' forecasts.

title: Millions of elderly Brits fear a grim choice this winter
description: When she first started to shed some weight, Yvonne DeBurgo quipped that she could afford to lose it.

title: Don't expect home prices to come crashing down
description: Rising mortgage rates are taking a toll on the US housing market. But those hoping for prices to drop probably won't catch a break anytime soon.

title: He bought a movie star's home in France and paid $300,000 to fix the pool
description: Finding himself at a loose end on a rainy day in France, triathlete Jeremy arranged to view some properties in the quaint neighborhood he'd been staying in.

title: China markets decline as Covid cases hit all provinces
description: Chinese markets declined on Wednesday as global investors continue to deal with the aftermath of Federal Reserve chair Jerome Powell's hawkish speech at Jackson Hole last week, and the alarming spread of Covid in China.

title: Analysis: Last-season leftovers may get a second shot
description: What do you do when you when you need to rein in your shopping habit? Clean out the closet and try to make your old stuff feel new, right?
